name: Stardust Speedway Reimagined
description:
A short-term project made for my 2D Game Development Class at Laguna College of Art + Design! We were asked to take a classic game and recreate it, with a focus on the art assets, so of course I had to take a stab at a Sonic stage.

All visual and coding assets were created by me in 5 weeks, with the exception of the character controller, which was provided to us by our professor. Audio is pulled from official games. No plans to expand on this at the moment, but I may polish it a little further when I have some free time.
